zone: Surat Thani (สุราษฎร์ธานี)
circumstances: En route, the left engine failed. The crew was cleared to divert to Surat Thani Airport for an emergency landing. Upon touchdown, the airplane went out of control, veered off runway and came to rest. All 10 occupants escaped with minor injuries while the aircraft was written off.
probable_cause: Failure of the left engine in flight for unknown reasons.
